channel.title: ::shout for donators, *DDS SPECED*
channel.description:
Hello,
NOTE IT IS FOR ****DDSSPECED****
I have a question, how to make players that donated can shout?
::shout , character-donator = 1
If it has character-donator = 1 it can shoot if it has character-donator = 0 it cant shoot
how to make?, Thanks.

item.title: ::shout for donators, *DDS SPECED*
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“XxJtxX, post:6, topic:258617”]try this:

if (command.startsWith("shout") && donator > 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } [/quote]

donator > 1) is basically saying any rank higher than one would work, but one itself wouldn’t. It’s simple if you think about it but that wouldn’t work in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: ::shout for donators, *DDS SPECED*
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

try this:

if (command.startsWith("shout") && donator > 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::shout for donators, *DDS SPECED*
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

got error:

[code]client.java:7353: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable character
location:class client
If (command.startsWith(“shout”) && (character-donator = 1)) {
^

client.java:7353: unexpected type
required: variable
found : value
If (command.startsWith(“shout”) && (character-donator = 1)) {
^
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: ::shout for donators, *DDS SPECED*
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:3, topic:258617”] if (command.startsWith("shout") && if (character-donator = 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

so like that?[/quote]No,

if (command.startsWith("shout") && (character-donator = 1)) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } Like that, it wasn’t with the extra if, my bad.

Read full topic

item.title: ::shout for donators, *DDS SPECED*
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

if (command.startsWith("shout") && if (character-donator = 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("["+playerName+"]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

so like that?

Read full topic

item.title: ::shout for donators, *DDS SPECED*
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

add && if (character-donator = 1) to the if statement.

Read full topic
